name: Lights Of Life
description:
Joseph, along with his two friends, sets out in a car to bury his sister in their childhood village after her death. However, they didn't know that many unexpected challenges awaited them, and bad luck wouldn't leave them alone.

Zombie invasion!

The zombies have invaded the village, so sneak through their midst and hide in between plants to enter houses and seek shelter.

Arm yourself and attack!

Sneak into the abandoned military camp and find weapons. Don't waste your ammunition; aim for the zombies' heads.

Hide and lay low!

You can hide among the plants, and the creatures won't be able to see you. But shh, don't make any noise. Although zombies have poor eyesight, their hearing is quite sensitive.

Plunder the abandoned village!

The massive village is deserted. There are only zombies and vampires around. Stay away from zombie herds. Zombies often roam in groups and kill their prey in one go.

Escape from the village!

You may find one or two working cars at the military camp. If you can start one, you can escape from the village and get away from the zombies. Run over and kill zombies with your car!

And remember, don't trust anyone!
